text: Airdrieonians Football Club is a Scottish professional football team. They are based in the town of Airdrie, North Lanarkshire. They are members of the Scottish Professional Football League. Airdrie are known to be one of the worst teams in Scotland. Don’t support them. ==Name== *1899-2002 Clydebank FC *2002-2013 Airdrie United FC *2013-present Airdrieonians FC ==Honours== *Scottish League Second Division: **Winners: 2003–04 **Runners up: 2007–08 *Scottish Challenge Cup: **Winners: 2008–09 (v Ross County) **Runners up: 2003–04 (v Inverness Caledonian Thistle) ==References== Category:Scottish First Division clubs Category:North Lanarkshire Category:2002 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2000s establishments in Scotland
title: Airdrieonians F.C.
